column1: Local Foods////Yummy! If you're looking for something light and delicious
column2: this is the place. Everything looks very clean and the food is presented very pretty. There are free drinks on the side and plenty of unique seating. I forgot what my salad was called but it was mainly kale and it was the second salad on the menu! The serving size was very large
column3: I only finished half of my salad. I tried my uncle's duck confit sandwich it was really good! The chips are a little too salty for my taste though. The smoked salmon that my dad had tasted normal- nothing out of the ordinary. Overall
